author: lwang046
body:
#### PR description:

Removed all VME related plots and tasks.
Added and modified some plots in the TPTask
Made change to the charge averaged time calculation requested from Hcal operation colleges
Reduce the y-axis of FiberuTCAFiberCh to exclude channels.

#### PR validation:
Tested with `cmsRun hcal_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py` and `cmsRun hcalreco_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py` on recent data, private DQM plots reflects the desired changes.
title: HcalDQM: Update for Run3 based on recent commissions runs
